questions.question: A cylinderical rod with heat generation q of 262 x 106 w/m3 having k = 15 w/m-k diameter 7 mm and length (L) 0.8 m is used to heat the water. If the outer surface temp is at (Ts) 110° C. Find the maximum temperature.
Consider a sphere of radius 2cm with heat generation of 3 x 108 w/m3. K = 30 w/m-k & outer surface is maintained at 111° C. Calculate the maximum temperature.
